subject: Add code quality review and security analysis
body:
Completed comprehensive code quality and security review:

- Security Analysis:
  * Reviewed all RLS policies (excellent, no vulnerabilities found)
  * Checked for SQL injection (none found, all queries parameterized)
  * Checked for XSS vulnerabilities (none found, proper React escaping)
  * Validated input sanitization (good, minor recommendations documented)

- Decision Comments Added:
  * services/messages.ts: Document why reply data is denormalized, why analytics is non-blocking
  * services/chat.ts: Explain word-based code generation and collision handling
  * Migration files: Clarify security decisions (RLS policies, Edge Function architecture)

- Documentation:
  * Created CODE_QUALITY_SECURITY_REPORT.md with comprehensive findings
  * Security rating: Good (no critical issues)
  * Detailed recommendations for monitoring, moderation, and spam prevention
  * Roadmap for future sessions

Overall assessment: Codebase is in excellent shape with strong security practices.
title: Add code quality review and security analysis
